name: Spring-boot-web
tagline: A project which contains a simple Spring boot example for Web applications
body:
### Welcome to Jemos Spring Boot Web sample app
The goal os this project is to provide a simple and easy template for a Spring MVC application using Spring Boot. 
What are the advantages of using Spring Boot? 

* Zero XML configuration for your Spring MVC App
* Easy Maven setup in a *jar* project which runs your Web application
* Full support for unit and integration testing of your webapp without the need to start and stop containers
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
